00042 /**

00044  */

00069   /** 
00070    * Set the log from LogStream to parse memory and other stats from.

00072    * @param logFile - path to log file
00073    */
00074   void setLogFile(const std::string &logFile) { m_LogToParse = logFile; }

00079    * @param vgLog - path to valgrind log file

00088 
00089   int getNumFailed() const { return m_NumFailed; }
00090

00092    * Run the command to check the test. 
00093    * @return true if executes sucessfully, false otherwise.
00094    */
00095   bool run();

00097   /** 
00098    * Do we pass our post-run tests??? 
00099    * @return true if we pass our test
00100    */
00101   bool pass();

00104    * Get whatever message was reported.

00113    * @param targetName - path to directory to be synced
00114    * @param localName - where we want data synced to locally.
00115    * @param hostUrl - url for data if copying necessary.
00116    * @param errorMsg - fill in error message here if something goes wrong.
00117    *

00152    * that according to the valgrind manual it is best to compile the program
00153    * with -O0 (optimization level zero) to avoid false positives.
00154    * http://valgrind.org/docs/manual/quick-start.html#quick-start.prepare
00155    *
